item.title: Ansible Basic Tutorial
item.description: Hi, for this tutorial, I will present you how to use Ansible What is Ansible Ansible can be defined with the first line with the following sentences Ansible is an IT automation tool. It can configure systems, deploy software, and orchestrate more advanced IT tasks such as continuous deployments or zero downtime rolling updates. @docs.ansible.com Basic requirements For Ansible to work, we need 2 things A Unix host A target with a ssh server and python3 Setup Ansible If you not already have Ansible do the following or see the Ansible installation Guide
